CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 28, 1946, pg. 15, reads: "The Night Before Christmas - Billy McNeill contemplates sister 'Jackie's' work on the Christmas tree at their home, 763 Anaheim Street. Billy would rather chew on his finger, but 'Jackie' wants to get the work done and get to bed before Santa comes.  They are the children of Mr. and Mrs. William McNeill Jr. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Billy and Jackie McNeill decorating Christmas tree with train set underneath, in McNeill home, 763 Anaheim Street
